scripts.pack: del /q /s 1>nul dist && webpack --config webpack.config.js && copy src\index.html dist\index.html
scripts.reload-engine: copy ..\engine\dist\game-engine-* .\ && npm uninstall game-engine && npm install game-engine-1.0.1.tgz
scripts.full-reload: npm run reload-engine && npm run pack && npm run start
